name: DungeonScape (firedragonvlad)
description:
May only the bravest dare escape the dungeon. Originally made for the Wowie 3.0 Gamejam.  I present you, DungeonsScape made by firedragonvlad. A short Adventure game where you will explore the dungeon, dying to the traps that await you, getting further every time, until you succeed. Good Luck!

All assets made by me

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
